front.title: YANG Data Model for Segment Routing

abstract.t: This document defines a YANG data model ([RFC6020], [RFC7950]) for segment routing ([RFC8402]) configuration and operation. This YANG model is intended to be used on network elements to configure or operate segment routing MPLS data plane [RFC8660]. This document defines also generic containers that SHOULD be reused by IGP protocol modules to support segment routing.
